operations.fsa.ver1
Class Unary

java.lang.Object
  operations.fsa.ver1.Unary

public class Unary
extends Object

This class contatins methods for unary operations on automata.

Author:
Kristian Edlund, Axel Gottlieb Michelsen, Lenko Grigorov

Unary()
           
 
Method Summary
static void accessible(FSAModel automaton)
          Finds the accessible part of an automaton The function does not return a new automaton, so if the original automaton should not be changed, make sure to copy it first.

accessible

public static void accessible(FSAModel automaton)
Finds the accessible part of an automaton The function does not return a new automaton, so if the original automaton should not be changed, make sure to copy it first.

Parameters:
automaton - The automaton which to find the accessible part of

trim

public static void trim(FSAModel automaton)
Finds the trim part of an automaton The function does not return a new automaton, so if the original automaton should not be changed, make sure to copy it first.

prefixClosure

public static void prefixClosure(FSAModel automaton)
Makes an automaton prefix closed The function does not return a new automaton, so if the original automaton should not be changed, make sure to copy it first.

Parameters:
automaton - The automaton to prefix close
